website_summaries.verdict: Drives past all of the competition with patented technology to make your eyes bright and healthy.
pros: Formulated with Estee Lauder's own ChronoluxCB technology which helps to decrease puffiness around the eyes and tiredness
It improves appearance of upper lids
It can actually be used for day and night
Results will be seen in as little as one week

customer_reviews.title: Seems like product was tampered with
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as Christmas present for my wife. She doesn't get around to using it until mid-February. Noticed smudges on the top of the bottle. Label is scratched and box was not wrapped in plastic. Missed window to return but she let me know not to get her cosmetics anywhere other than straight from manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Jason S.

customer_reviews.title: it's not a full bottle
customer_reviews.text: There are definitely less content in this bottle than what I bought from the Store. I should not have bought it here just for less money...
customer_reviews.author: Zhang

customer_reviews.title: Definitely REAL Estee Lauder (not a knock off).  Love this serum for oily skin.
customer_reviews.text: I'm 44 and have used this serum since I was 21. This is definitely the real, legitimate product! I took a few pics - one is the product and box, and the other is my old bottle (purchased from Nordstrom) on the left and this bottle on the right. I would definitely purchase this again because it is a significantly better price than what I've found most of the time. It's great for ppl with oilier skin who want to hydrate without adding a greasy feel. I wear it on my face every night. I have extremely sensitive skin and this doesn't bother me one bit. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Night Owl

customer_reviews.title: Burns the skin.
customer_reviews.text: I have tried using this product two times; it's burming my skin, unlike the identical product which I purchased at either Neiman -Marcus or Dillard's stores.
customer_reviews.author: greg

customer_reviews.title: Unauthentic product
customer_reviews.text: definitely fake product!!! Bottle is dirty and content is just like water. plastic bottles with stinky smells!
customer_reviews.author: zhongyuan Feng

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS COUNTERFEIT
customer_reviews.text: This product has different packaging and consistency from the real one. DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.author: TD

customer_reviews.title: not good value
customer_reviews.text: There was not very much in the bottle for the money, and seemed very watery.
customer_reviews.author: jacquio

customer_reviews.title: Fake Item
customer_reviews.text: Me and my wife always buy this item from Sephora store and never happend anything to ours skin. On the july 2020, the item was out of stock so we decide to buy on amazon. After 2 wks only using this item. We started had pimples and small pimples under ours skin. Please take a look at our pictures
customer_reviews.author: Mike Huynh

customer_reviews.title: Expensive and Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I live for this serum. It’s expensive and a lot for what it is. I initially bought the sample size to treat my even skin and acne scars and loved it. I finally bought the larger bottle and it’s an essential step in my daily and nightly skin care routine. I highly recommend this, I have two bottles and a travel size one for when I’m running around. I saw results within a week and my skin feels amazing with it. I have combination skin, summer it’s all oil and winter it’s dry and this feels luxurious. Hasn’t made me break out.
customer_reviews.author: Irina

customer_reviews.title: Superior skin care product
customer_reviews.text: This is a terrific product which I've been using nightly for a long long time. I'm 88 yrs old and have great skin thanks for great products -- both Este Lauder and Lancome. Joyce/Tucson
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Product!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the Estee Lauder Advanced Night Repair Recovery Complex II. I use it every night on my face and I feel it helps with dark spots, lines, wrinkles and the like. I ordered the most recent bottle so that I have a spare supply and don't run out - that's how much I like this product. It is not inexpensive but it is worth it! DKG
customer_reviews.author: DKG

customer_reviews.title: Improve your skin!
customer_reviews.text: Estée Lauder Advanced night repair helps my skin look and feel refreshed after a good nights rest. I wake up and my skin is wrinkle free. I recommend this serum to anyone who is hesitant about its ability to work on your skin.
customer_reviews.author: Maria V. Castaneda

customer_reviews.title: Love Esteé Lauder skincare!
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased this in a department store & paid much more. This serum arrived in all the original packaging. But at a great price. This is a great product! Helps to give a glow to the skin w/o harsh exfoliation. Arrived in 2 days!
customer_reviews.author: RestlessHeartTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely not the usual solution I get. I usually buy from sephora or elsewhere. This seems to be a fake product. The writing on the bottle in comparison to the true brand is even different. The consistency and smell is also different. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this originally because it had great reviews, but it smells like snail serum and I just couldn’t sleep with it on my face. It doesn’t feel like it soaked into the skin well enough without leaving a sticky feel. It’s quite expensive and Ive completely switched to clarins serum instead.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: Estee Lauder is a quality product. You definitely have to pay for it.
customer_reviews.author: NDS

customer_reviews.title: great for dry skin
customer_reviews.text: EL Advanced night repair, is a great product for my skin, which tends to be dry....as I am in my 60's....skin needs the added moisture, especially to slow process of aging wrinkles, allows make-up to be applied with a smooth look, is a lightweight product, not feel greasy or oily....simply blends into skin ...as a nice drink of water
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette Vaira

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful youthful skin
customer_reviews.text: Every woman's desire is to have beautiful flawless skin. That's exactly what I have would not go A-day without using advance repair Estee Lauder products are phenomenal

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this for years. Tried less expensive others but learned you get what you pay for.

customer_reviews.title: FAKE PLEASE DONT PUT on YOUR SKIN!!
customer_reviews.text: This is extreamly dangerous I have used this product before and this is a total fake. The smell is horrible to start with and the serum is nothing but a water down liquid. I am so disappointed should of paid those extra 10 dollars on sephora or a other department store. Also the lid of this product is not even near the gold its suppose to be.
customer_reviews.author: Emidia Greta Lumbrano

customer_reviews.title: The item lets me little sad because it looks not new
customer_reviews.text: The item lets me little sad because it looks not new. Firstly, the letters on the cover are vague and even indistinct. Moreover, the cover is broken and like be opened before. I can not believe it was certified goods.

customer_reviews.title: This stuff plus the Resiliance Lift Night is awesome. Better texture
customer_reviews.text: This stuff plus the Resiliance Lift Night is awesome. Better texture, hydration, pore appearance after just one use. Glowy skin the more I use it.

customer_reviews.title: FAKE product and ruined my face.
customer_reviews.text: Fake product made my face have little trails of red bumps around the inside area of my eyes which are just horrible and freaked me out. I stopped using it immediately. Do NOT buy this! it’s not worth it to save a couple dollars and buy this on Amazon. Just go to Sephora or somewhere legit where you can see it forreal.

customer_reviews.title: My skin felt much hydrated than earlier...great product
customer_reviews.text: I must say this product is a value for your money. I felt my skin got a lot better than earlier in terms of texture and hydration

customer_reviews.title: Product quantity
customer_reviews.text: I opened my bottle for the first time today and it is not even half full. I threw away the box when I received it so I cannot even return it. I will now buy from Ulta as at least there I can see whats in the bottle.

customer_reviews.title: Old product

My wife is very disappointed in this product. Rather spend 103$ for real one than $84 for this one. Waste of money amid corona virus for fake item.

It's an excellent product, well worth the money spent! Service from this vendor was fast and came as ordered.

The consistency and scent were both very wrong. The packaging was also obviously errant, lettering was blurred, plastic trim was an off-color, and the bottle itself felt thinner and cheaper. Amazon returned without issue, but this is still annoying.

I've been using the ANR for over a month now, and my skin does not look as good as it did when using youth code. The youth code did a better job on diminishing fine lines and the overall appearance of my skin. UPDATE: I actually did see results with Estee Lauder ANR and would recommend it.

customer_reviews.title: The best vitamin serum out there
customer_reviews.text: This stuff if super expensive but it lasts for about a year. I buy the 1.7 ounce jar every November and it lasts me for almost a year. You only need a few drops. I use it at night and when I wake up my skin is glowing and my fine lines are like nothing. I use it under my olay moisturizer during the day too. I'm 36, and started getting lines around my eyes. This stuff works magic on your whole face and neck. If you're going to spend the money on a facial product, I highly recommend this one it's worth every penny. It takes years off. No one believes how old I am :)

product_meta.title: ESTEE LAUDER Advanced Night Repair Recovery Complex Ii, 1.7 Ounce
product_meta.description:
Size:1.7 Fl Oz

Wake up to beautiful skin, every day. Address all key signs of visible aging with exclusive ChronoluxCB technology for more comprehensive and precise nighttime repair. Promotes a natural nighttime purification process, vital to younger-looking skin. Tested and proven: lines and wrinkles look significantly reduced. Skin feels smoother, hydrated, stronger. Looks younger, radiant, more translucent and even toned. Proven effective for every ethnicity. Dermatologist-tested 

INGREDIENTS
Ingredients: Water\Aqua\Eau, Bifida Ferment Lysate, Methyl Gluceth-20, Peg-75, Bis-Peg-18 Methyl Ether Dimethyl Silane, Butylene Glycol, Propanediol, Cola Acuminata (Kola) Seed Extract, Hydrolyzed Algin, Pantethine, Caffeine, Lecithin, Tripeptide-32, Ethylhexylglycerin, Sodium Rna, Bisabolol, Glycereth-26, Squalane, Sodium Hyaluronate, Oleth-3 Phosphate, Caprylyl Glycol, Lactobacillus Ferment, Oleth-3, Oleth-5, Anthemis Nobilis (Chamomile), Yeast Extract\Faex\Extrait De Levure, Choleth-24, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Ceteth-24, Tocopheryl Acetate, Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate, Hexylene Glycol, Carbomer, Triethanolamine, Trisodium Edta, Bht, Xanthan Gum, Phenoxyethanol, Red 4 (Ci 14700), Yellow 5 (Ci 19140) <ILN39632>
feature_bullets: It maximizes the power of skin's natural nighttime renewal with our exclusive ChronoluxCB Technology
Ideal for multiple signs of aging, visible age prevention, dryness, dehydration, lines, wrinkles, dullness, and loss of radiance
